queue.description: If cashReserves is present, require balanceSheet.asOf (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing cash asOf (queue)

queue.description: If preferredEquity is present, require balanceSheet.asOf (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing preferred asOf (queue)

queue.description: Ensure balanceSheet cash/debt/preferred fields are numbers when present (hard).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier hardens balance sheet numeric types

queue.description: If cashReserves is present, require balanceSheet.source.cashSourceUrl (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing cash source url

queue.description: If costBasisAvg present, require costBasisSourceUrl (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing cost basis evidence

queue.description: Require listing.currency present (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing listing currency

queue.description: If totalDebt is present, require balanceSheet.asOf (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing debt asOf (queue)

queue.description: If totalDebt is present, require balanceSheet.source.debtSourceUrl (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing debt source url

queue.description: Ensure holdings.amount is finite number (hard).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier hardens holdings amount type

queue.description: If holdings.amount present, require asOf date (holdings.asOf) or holdingsLastUpdated (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing holdings asOf

queue.description: If holdingsSource == sec-filing, require holdingsSourceUrl or holdingsAccession (hard).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier requires evidence for SEC holdings (queue)

queue.description: Require holdings.source.holdingsSource present (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing holdings source

queue.description: Require listing.country and listing.exchangeMic not UNKNOWN (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags unknown listing metadata

queue.description: Flag negative values for holdings/shares/cash/debt/preferred (hard).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags invalid negative values

queue.description: If preferredEquity is present, require balanceSheet.source.preferredSourceUrl (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing preferred source url

queue.description: If sharesForMnav present, require shares.asOf (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing shares asOf

queue.description: If shares look SEC-sourced, require sharesSourceUrl (hard).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier requires evidence for SEC shares (queue)

queue.description: If sharesForMnav is present, require shares.source.sharesSource or sharesSourceUrl (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing shares source metadata (queue)

queue.description: If a sourceUrl is present, require it starts with http(s) (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier validates source url format

queue.description: If stakingPct is present, require stakingSourceUrl (warn-level).
queue.commitMessage: feat(state): verifier flags missing staking evidence (queue)
